title: Lunch Special
subtitle: Monday–Sunday 10am–3pm
info:
All entrées served with steamed rice, salad and soup.
Fried vegetable spring roll or pork roll add $1.00 each.

Coffee, Ice Tea, Hot Green Tea (free refill)
Golden Soft Shell Crab
contents.desc: Soft shell crab and asparagus seasoned in light batter, deep fried. Served with sweet chili sauce.

contents.title: BBQ Ribs

contents.desc: Crispy fried spring rolls stuffed with minced pork, glass noodle, shredded carrots, and woo dear mushroom. Served with sweet chili sauce.

title: Entrées
info:
All entrées served with steamed rice.
Brown rice add 75¢.

contents.title: Tilapia
contents.desc: Battered, deep fried tilapia, topped off with sautéed shrimp and choice of basil or ginger or sweet & sour sauce.

contents.title: Grilled Salmon
contents.desc: Grilled salmon and shrimp topped with sautéed vegetable and oyster sauce.

contents.title: Golden Eggplant
contents.desc: Battered, deep fried eggplant, topped off with sautéed shrimp, crawfish, vegetable and curry paste.

contents.title: Garlic Shrimp
contents.desc: Grilled shrimp on steamed broccoli bed topped with garlic sauce.

contents.title: Beef Asparagus
contents.desc: Sautéed beef with asparagus, carrots, and onions in oyster sauce.

contents.title: Himalaya Chicken
contents.desc: Sautéed chicken breast with onions, carrots, roasted cashew nuts and scallions in our house special sauce

contents.title: Garlic Pepper Chicken
contents.desc: Choice of sliced chicken or sliced beef sautéed with garlic and white peppers on a bed of steamed broccoli.

contents.info: For following dishes, choose vegetable $9, chicken $10, beef $10, shrimp $11, seafood $13.

contents.title: Red Curry
contents.desc: Choice of meat or seafood in red curry with coconut milk, bamboo, carrots, onions, bell peppers and basil leaves.

contents.title: Green Curry
contents.desc: Choice of meat or seafood in green curry with coconut milk, bamboo, carrots, onions, bell peppers and basil leaves.

contents.title: Panang Curry
contents.desc: Panang curry paste slowly simmered in creamy coconut milk with bell peppers, lime leaves, and chioce of meat or seafood.

contents.title: Massamun Curry
contents.desc: Choice of meat or seafood cooked in massamun curry with coconut milk, onions, potatoes and peanuts.

contents.info: For following dishes, choose vegetable $9, chicken $9, beef $10, shrimp $11, seafood $13.

contents.title: Pad Ped Curry
contents.desc: Spicy curry paste sautéed with carrots, bell peppers, bamboo, basil leaves, lime leaves, with your choice of meat or seafood.

contents.title: Basil
contents.desc: Chili garlic sauce wiht fresh basil leaves, onions, carrots and bell pepers, and choice of meat or seafood

contents.title: Ginger
contents.desc: Choice of meat or seafood stir-fried with fresh ginger, onions, scallions and black mushrooms in soy bean sauce.

contents.title: Sweet & Sour
contents.desc: Choice of meat or seafood sautéd with tomatoes, pineapples, cucumbers and onions.

contents.title: Tom Yum
contents.desc: Thai famous hot and sour soup, full flavor of lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, glangal, chili paste and mushroom.

contents.title: Tom Kar
contents.desc: Chicken or shrimp and mushroom in a unique combination of coconut milk and galangal with other herbs

contents.title: Thai Beef Noodle Soup (large bowl)
contents.desc: Light soup prepared with rice noodles, sliced beef and bean sprout.

contents.title: House Salad
contents.desc: A bed of green mix with tomatoes, cucumbers, cilantro with homemade creamy dressing. Additional charge to add the following:

contents.title: House Salad with Beef or Seafood
contents.desc: Comes with sweet-lime dressing.

contents.title: Papaya Salad
contents.desc: Shredded papaya, tomatoes, carrots, and peanuts tossed in lime juice.

contents.title: Squid Salad
contents.desc: Mixture of sliced squid and cabbage.

contents.title: Seaweed Salad
contents.desc: Mixed of seaweed with sesame dressing.

contents.title: Crispy Fish Salad
contents.desc: Fried fish to perfection mexed with onion, cilantro and lime juice.

contents.title: Omelets (with cheese and toast or grits)

options.title: A. Crawfish Omelet: Crawfish, onions, bell pepper, tomato
B. Seafood Omelet: Shrimp, crabstick, and vegetable
C. Ham Omelet: Ham, mushroom, onion, tomato
